Bananas

27 Jun 2020 - alex - Alex Smith

Here’s a banana or something

More bananas? What’s the deal. More content. Lorem Ipsum… In some countries, bananas used for cooking may be called “plantains”, distinguishing them from dessert bananas. The fruit is variable in size, color, and firmness, but is usually elongated and curved, with soft flesh rich in starch covered with a rind, which may be green, yellow, red, purple, or brown when ripe.
